22#include <sys/cdefs.h>
23#ifndef lint
24__RCSID("$NetBSD: print-frag6.c,v 1.7 2017/09/08 14:01:13 christos Exp $");
25#endif
26
27/* \summary: IPv6 fragmentation header printer */
28
29#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
30#include "config.h"
31#endif
32
33#include <netdissect-stdinc.h>
34
35#include "netdissect.h"
36#include "extract.h"
37
38#include "ip6.h"
39
40int
41frag6_print(netdissect_options *ndo, register const u_char *bp, register const u_char *bp2)
42{
43 register const struct ip6_frag *dp;
44 register const struct ip6_hdr *ip6;
45
46 dp = (const struct ip6_frag *)bp;
47 ip6 = (const struct ip6_hdr *)bp2;
48
49 ND_TCHECK(*dp);
50
51 if (ndo->ndo_vflag) {
52 ND_PRINT((ndo, "frag (0x%08x:%d|%ld)",
53 EXTRACT_32BITS(&dp->ip6f_ident),
54 EXTRACT_16BITS(&dp->ip6f_offlg) & IP6F_OFF_MASK,
55 sizeof(struct ip6_hdr) + EXTRACT_16BITS(&ip6->ip6_plen) -
56 (long)(bp - bp2) - sizeof(struct ip6_frag)));
57 } else {
58 ND_PRINT((ndo, "frag (%d|%ld)",
59 EXTRACT_16BITS(&dp->ip6f_offlg) & IP6F_OFF_MASK,
60 sizeof(struct ip6_hdr) + EXTRACT_16BITS(&ip6->ip6_plen) -
61 (long)(bp - bp2) - sizeof(struct ip6_frag)));
62 }
63
64 /* it is meaningless to decode non-first fragment */
65 if ((EXTRACT_16BITS(&dp->ip6f_offlg) & IP6F_OFF_MASK) != 0)
66 return -1;
67 else
68 {
69 ND_PRINT((ndo, " "));
70 return sizeof(struct ip6_frag);
71 }
72trunc:
73 ND_PRINT((ndo, "[|frag]"));
74 return -1;
75}
76
